_source.short_desc: Reserved seating or general admission, our robust platform means venues learn one easy system to manage ticketing and patron data.
_source.long_desc: Reserved seating or general admission, your performing arts or live music venue will love how easy we make managing and selling events. We never charge your customers a service fee but allow you to pass on a fee and retain all revenue. Packages, subscriptions, discounts, surveys, marketing, fundraising, and more! Use our free trial to experience stellar customer service and learn why ThunderTix is the #1 choice for live performances.
_source.pricing_details:
Plans are based on a per ticket basis.
Plans range from $1/ticket to $1.75/ticket, depending on the plan.

$20 monthly minimum for General Admission, includes 20 tickets per month.
$25 monthly minimum for Reserved Seating, includes 20 tickets per month.
$175 monthly minimum for Enterprise, includes 100 tickets per month.
_source.target_audience: Serving the performing arts organizations -- theaters, dance, galas, and comedy -- plus live music, guided tours, and festivals. Event listings in English, French, and Spanish.

media.caption: Create and manage events from one place. Staff can sell tickets on behalf of patrons at the box office with ease. The administrative portal integrates with card readers and terminals for a rapid point of sale.
A chronological events site will be compiled automatically to use on your website, social media, and email blasts
Seating charts are custom-built to reflect each unique venue layout. We'll include important details for customers like where stairs, the lobby, restrooms, or the bar are located.
ThunderTix Dashboard - track revenue streams and gain insight with month-over-month comparisons
A color-coded calendar display shows all upcoming events by month making it easy to compare one production versus another.

category_features.name: Email Marketing
category_features.definition: Create and send email blasts/campaigns

related_products.short_desc: Organizers of events of all sizes use Eventbrite to power their live experience.
related_products.features: Eventbrite is a ticketing and event technology platform that helps businesses organize and sell tickets to events online  while helping people discover events that fuel their passions. From workshops to concerts to conferences to world-renowned film and music festivals, Eventbrite houses events of all shapes and sizes. Eventbrites powerful platform, which can be accessed online or via mobile apps, scales from basic registration and ticketing to a fully featured event management platform.

related_products.short_desc: GoTo Webinar powers millions of webinars each year and is now part of GoTo Connect, all-in-one communications software built for SMBs.
related_products.features: GoTo Webinar is trusted by more customers than any other online webinar solution and powers millions of webinars each year. Whether you use webinars for marketing, training, or corporate communications, GoTo Webinar puts the fun back into webinars with reliable technology that's super simple to use. Get the features, integrations and analytics you need to engage your audience and make personal connections that drive your business.

related_products.short_desc: Bitrix24 #1 free conference and event management platform used by over 8 million businesses.
related_products.features: Over 8M companies use Bitrix24 as free event management software for conferences, since it comes with all the necessary tools for the job. First, there is CRM and client management module that lets you create quotes and invoices, send emails and manage vendors. Second there are shared calendars that let you schedule and book multiple venues. Third, there's a project management module and task templates that organizers use to manage ground crews.

related_products.short_desc: Eventzilla is an online event registration & marketing platform for virtual in-person and hybrid events.
related_products.features:
Eventzilla is a leading cloud-based event registration & marketing platform for in-person and virtual events. We make it easy for event organizers to create a beautiful, professional web presence to promote their events.

Works perfect for conferences, fundraisers, classes, reunions, concerts, & sports events.

Eventzilla has everything you need to setup a custom event website, publish event schedule, process payments, manage attendee details and check-in easily.

related_products.short_desc: The new standard in online registration and payments. Manage your conference with the tools you need to execute a great event.
related_products.features: Regpack is the leading online conference registration and management platform trusted by more than 7,000 organizations worldwide. Regpack gives you the tools you need to manage every aspect of your conference, including flexible form building, real-time dynamic reporting, integrated online payments, custom discounts, variable attendee pricing, automatic billing, payment plans, and more. Increase attendance and grow your revenue, with Regpack.

related_products.short_desc: Webex Events (formerly Socio) is an end-to-end event solution that allows organizers to host engaging virtual and in-person conference
related_products.features: Webex Events (formerly Socio) is an end-to-end event solution that allows organizers to host engaging multi-session conference experiences that drive results. Host conferences your attendees will love and bring your conference to life with customizable features, content and branding. Drive revenue and get actionable data for attendee engagement, ticket sales, sponsorships, and more.

related_products.short_desc: Eliminate the guesswork and create unique events for attendees while reducing the amount of time and effort that goes into them.
related_products.features: Eventtia is an in-person and online events platform that empowers marketers to grow their business. From setting up the attendee registration process to sending email campaigns and measuring ROI, our platform provides the tools to design unique experiences, attract high-quality leads, and build stronger relationships.

related_products.short_desc: Your Affordable, All-in-One Event Platform. Live streaming, virtual exhibitor booths, interactive networking, breakout sessions, more!
related_products.features: A powerful but affordable all-in-one virtual, hybrid, and in-person conference platform with 24/7 live customer support. The platform offers robust virtual event hosting features including ticket sales, live streaming, live chat & polling, virtual exhibitor booths, breakout sessions, A.I. powered networking, gamification, and more. Whether hosting an event for 100 people or 100,000+ Accelevents will allow you to create a virtual experience that your attendees remember.

related_products.short_desc: The most advanced and customizable webinar platform
related_products.features:
LiveWebinar.com is a cloud-based webinar software that helps both small teams and enterprises manage webinars and online meetings. It lets any sales, HR, or marketing team easily perform online events for their audiences. 

Its features range from live streaming, presentation and screen sharing possibility, and fully customizable branding option, to user engagement features like polls and surveys, voting, and Call To Action. 

LiveWebinar also enables organizations to analyze audience engagement

related_products.short_desc: RegFox is the event management system built for the modern world of conferences.
related_products.features:
Tired of clunky and outdated registration platforms? 

RegFox is a powerful event registration platform for conferences, camps, classes, and more.
It's easy to use, highly customizable, and unbelievably affordable.  

Run your smoothest in-person event ever with the event management system built for the modern world of conferences.

related_products.short_desc: Event management suite with registration, ratings, mobile app, payments, speaker mgmt, space layout, and more. Live & virtual events.
related_products.features: AWARD-WINNING PLATFORM. Flat, predictable pricing. All features all of the time. Unlimited events including VIRTUAL events. Unlimited users. No credit card fees. Modern and easy to use for event hosts and attendees. Website creation, customized registration, free web-based mobile app, session ratings, speaker ratings, payment processing, speaker/agenda management, space layout, CEU's, etc.   Flexible configuration options serve virtually any event business model.  Rated tops by Capterra!

Get the features, integrations and analytics you need to engage your audience and make personal connections that drive your business.

similar_products.short_desc: A comprehensive event management software that empowers organizers to plan, promote, and run online and in-person events.
similar_products.features: Zoho Backstage is all-in-one event management software to plan and run in-person, virtual, and hybrid event experiences from beginning to end with greater efficiency and impact. Right from designing an event website, selling tickets, and marketing an event, to communicating with attendees, presenting sessions, and analyzing an event's performance, Zoho Backstage has everything you need to grow your event and accelerate its success.

Drive revenue and get actionable data for attendee engagement, ticket sales, sponsorships, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: Hearty technology, lightweight package. We combine serious conference management software with a platform designed for regular humans.
similar_products.features: Swoogo is the #1 conference software that increases your productivity and ROI-not your stress levels. Designed for virtual & in-person conferences with hybrid capabilities, we provide a platform that creates a streamlined, customizable experience for your attendees from start to finish. Includes unlimited events & registrations, robust registration capabilities, built-in analytics, free integrations, intuitive website+email marketing tools, attendee management & world-class customer support.

similar_products.short_desc: Whether hybrid, virtual or in-person, eShow provides the professional tools and web-based solutions necessary for event management team
similar_products.features:
Whether hybrid, virtual or in-person, eShow provides the professional tools and web-based solutions necessary for event management teams worldwide. Founded in 1996, eShow has helped Event Managers run thousands of events worldwide with tasks including registration, mobile apps, event websites, RFID, badge printing, abstract collection and so much more! 

When you choose the eShow product(s) that fit your needs, you tap into a powerful engine that no single-function supplier can hope to match.

similar_products.short_desc: ConveneAGM is the AGM solution that enables you to conduct virtual or hybrid shareholder meetings in compliance to existing guidelines.
similar_products.features: ConveneAGM is the end-to-end eAGM conference solution designed to conduct engaging virtual or hybrid shareholder meetings. Organizations can hold a real-time AGM broadcast where shareholders can register, vote on resolutions, send proxy forms, and participate in live Q&A. It streamlines the AGM process and requirements into an all-in-one platform to aid secretaries, scrutineers, and share registrars. ConveneAGM is developed by Azeus, a CMMI Level 5 company and an expert in process efficiency.

similar_products.short_desc: Since 1995, we have provided event technology solutions and world-class service to the conference and tradeshow industry.
similar_products.features: Since 1995, we've provided the conference and tradeshow industry with innovative technologies designed to improve and simplify every event. With unrivaled customer support, global reach, and an eye on innovative technologies, we have powered over 12,000 events around the world.  In an industry of DIY platforms, we stand apart as a full service, white-glove solution when it is needed and do-it-yourself event technology when you do not.

similar_products.short_desc: Your Affordable, All-in-One Event Platform. Live streaming, virtual exhibitor booths, interactive networking, breakout sessions, more!
similar_products.features: A powerful but affordable all-in-one virtual, hybrid, and in-person conference platform with 24/7 live customer support. The platform offers robust virtual event hosting features including ticket sales, live streaming, live chat & polling, virtual exhibitor booths, breakout sessions, A.I. powered networking, gamification, and more. Whether hosting an event for 100 people or 100,000+ Accelevents will allow you to create a virtual experience that your attendees remember.

similar_products.short_desc: Conference planning simplified. Build custom forms, collect payments, promote sponsors & keep attendees informed, all in one system!
similar_products.features: Whether your next conference is virtual, onsite or hybrid, ClearEvent has you covered! Register participants easily with custom forms, collect online payments and keep your attendees informed with your very own branded app. Keep your sponsors happy by sending your attendees timed special offers! Everything you need to manage your event from start to finish. The best part? We will be there every step of the way. Our plans include in-app customer support, free of charge.

similar_products.short_desc: Manage ALL your Vendors, Sponsors, Volunteers, Bands, Car Shows, Tickets, Registrations, Seats and more with one Online Platform.
similar_products.features:
Event Essentials is a set of web-based modules designed for Festival and Event organizers to manage Ticket Sales, Registrations, Volunteers, Vendors, Sponsors, Attendees, Bands/Artists, Venues, Stages, Speakers, Sessions, Calendar, Media, Credentials, Staff, Resources, Interactive Maps, Text Alerts, Donations, Reports, Contracts & more! 

Pick only what you need. We design match all our pages to your Website.  Contact us to find out how you can streamline and your event efficiencies.

similar_products.short_desc: Glisser is an award-winning technology platform for virtual and hybrid meetings and events.
similar_products.features:
Glisser is an award-winning platform for virtual and hybrid meetings and events. We enable companies to power engaging event experiences by offering a ready-to-go event platform and a completely customizable solution that lets you take control of the look and feel of your virtual events.

Glisser Elements is our platform distilled down to its purest form. Our virtual and hybrid event Software Development Kits (SDKs) allow you to create unique virtual environments, inside your own websites.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Catering software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Catering tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Catering software manages business functions for the catering, event planning, and banquet management industries. Catering software provides an integrated solution for coordinating essential business processes including client details, locations, scheduling, inventory management, menu planning, waitstaff coordination, and payroll, as well as marketing and budgeting functions. Catering tools can include document management functionality to help track proposals, deposits, contracts, and client histories.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Event Check In software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Event Check In tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Event Check In software helps significantly speed up the check in process at conferences, performances, and other events. This type of software can be deployed on mobile devices, such as smartphones and tablets, as well as kiosks, and often provides badge printing capabilities. Many organizations use Event Check In software to capture attendee information for lead generating purposes.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Event Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Event Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Event Management software automates marketing, registration, coordination and scheduling of events. Planners use Event Management applications to manage the planning and process of meetings and events, including marketing, attendee registration, badge creation, calendar generation and venue space management. These applications also offer a variety of self-service functions for event attendees such as online registration, content delivery and fee payment. Event Management software is related to Registration software and Ticketing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Meeting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Meeting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Meeting software enables teams to coordinate, schedule, conduct, and participate in collaborative meetings.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Mobile Event Apps software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Mobile Event Apps tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Mobile Event Apps enable event organizers to consistently distribute important event information to the attendees in real time and facilitate networking among attendees.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Registration software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Registration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Registration software automates the process of registering for conferences, meetings, classes, and other events. These applications offer a customizable solution for attendance tracking and event or meeting registration tasks. They also provide tools for processing payments either in advance or onsite, as well as donation collection and volunteer coordination features. Registration solutions also offer a variety of self-service functions for event attendees such as online registration, content delivery, and fee payment. Registration software is related to Event Management software and Training software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Ticketing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Ticketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Ticketing software manages and automates online, kiosk, and box office ticketing for special events, theaters, parks, festivals, fairs, travel, and other activities. These applications help manage seat selections, event management, exhibitor data, performer assignments and locations, as well as online and onsite payment processing. Ticketing solutions also often integrate other business processes such as inventory control, transaction control, fulfillment history and sales tracking. Ticketing software is related to Event software, Registration software and Kiosk software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Venue Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Venue Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Venue Management solutions aim to help event planners with marketing and scheduling of their facilities, ensuring that appropriate services and resources are provided for each event, and that the facility's capacity is optimally utilized.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Web Conferencing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Web Conferencing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Web Conferencing software enables organizations to conduct interactive conferences and meetings online. Typical features include: two-way audio, video conferencing, application sharing, presentation streaming, presence/availability detection and electronic hand raising. Web Conferencing applications also often feature instant messaging, presence and contact management features. Web Conferencing software is related to Web Collaboration software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Webinar software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Webinar tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Webinar software allows companies to conduct and distribute interactive live and recorded promotional or educational video presentations to existing or potential customers.

_source.short_desc: Reserved seating or general admission, our robust platform means venues learn one easy system to manage ticketing and patron data.
_source.long_desc: Catering to the performing arts for in-person and virtual events. ThunderTix is easy-to-use and easy-to-train staff and volunteers! One system for reserved seating, general admission, fundraising, gift cards, subscriptions, merchandise, customer loyalty, coupons, patron data, and thermal ticket printing. Starting as low as $1 per ticket with nightly payouts. Free tickets are free! Experience stellar customer service with a free trial and learn why ThunderTix is the #1 choice for ticketing.
_source.pricing_details:
Plans are based on a per ticket basis.
Plans range from $1/ticket to $1.75/ticket, depending on the plan.

$20 monthly minimum for General Admission, includes 20 tickets per month.
$25 monthly minimum for Reserved Seating, includes 20 tickets per month.
$175 monthly minimum for Enterprise, includes 100 tickets per month.
_source.target_audience: Serving the performing arts organizations -- theaters, dance, galas, and comedy -- plus live music, guided tours, and festivals. Event listings in English, French, and Spanish.

Create and manage events from one place. Staff can sell tickets on behalf of patrons at the box office with ease. The administrative portal integrates with card readers and terminals for a rapid point of sale.

related_products.short_desc: Eventbrite provides cost-effective, innovative ticketing software to help businesses set up, manage, and sell out events online.
related_products.features: Eventbrite provides cost-effective ticketing software to help businesses manage, promote, and sell tickets to events online-while helping people discover events that fuel their passions. From backyard barbecues to classes to conferences to world-renowned film and music festivals, Eventbrite houses events of all shapes and sizes. As one of today's fastest-growing ticketing platforms, Eventbrite delivers innovative technology and low fees-and if your event is free, so is Eventbrite. Learn more.

related_products.short_desc: Powerful online ticketing and booking solutions for tour, activity, attraction, and event businesses of all sizes.
related_products.features: FareHarbor provides industry-leading online ticketing and booking solutions for tours, activities, attractions, and events. Through one intuitive Dashboard, FareHarbor eases operations for 16,000+ businesses worldwide. Options like custom seat maps, online seat selection, and automatic assignments can all be tailored to your unique needs while capacity limits and contactless ticket scanning help you maintain the latest safety protocols. All of this alongside our best-in-class, 24/7 support.

related_products.short_desc: Xola builds modern, easy-to-use, booking & marketing software for tour and activity businesses that will save you time & help you grow.
related_products.features: Xola is the only unified booking, sales, and marketing platform for tour and activity businesses. Manage bookings anywhere with real-time availability. Sell through the world's largest marketplaces in a few clicks. Increase online revenue with our powerful abandoned booking remarketing features and track your marketing success in Google Analytics. CC rates as low as 1.99% + 30 cents.

related_products.short_desc: Create a beautiful event website in minutes. Trusted by more than 300,000 people worldwide, including planners from Nike and MIT.
related_products.features:
Create a beautiful event website in minutes. 

Build an event website, collect registrations, sell tickets, send invites, track attendees, and promote your event online. Reliable and secure. 

Trusted by more than 500,000 people worldwide, including planners from Nike, MIT and Refinery29.

related_products.short_desc:
You dream it. We'll ticket it.

Ticket Tailor is an easy to use ticketing platform that puts you in control of your event ticketing.
related_products.features:
Sell tickets direct to your attendees with a simple to use and feature-rich ticketing platform.

- Flexible plans with no contracts
- Low fees (save thousands)
- Get paid directly via Stripe or PayPal
- Fully customise your box office
- Embed booking forms in to your website
- Collect, keep and own your attendee data
- Free check-in app
- Seating charts
- Integrate with your favourite tools
- Discount codes and voucher codes
- Dashboard reporting
- Exceptional customer support

related_products.short_desc: Event management software for fundraising including ticket sales, seating management, contact management, donation tracking and more.
related_products.features: Create any kind of custom ticket including sponsorship's.  Tickets can have included items with custom designed choices (ex. meal choice, t-shirt size, etc.).  Set ticket start and ending dates, limited ticket sales, promo codes and more.  Purchasers can specify their guests names and email addresses and after purchasing their tickets they can manage tickets they have purchased, change guest names, etc.   Credit cards are automatically stored securely on file for the guest to use at your event.

related_products.short_desc: Eventzilla is an online event registration & marketing platform for virtual in-person and hybrid events.
related_products.features:
Eventzilla is a leading cloud-based event registration & marketing platform with thousands of users worldwide. We make it easy for event organizers to create a beautiful, professional web presence to promote their events.

Works perfect for conferences, fundraisers, classes, reunions, concerts, & sports events.

Eventzilla has everything you need to setup a custom event website, publish event schedule, process payments, manage attendee details and check-in easily.

related_products.short_desc: Free, professional-level online ticket sales system that's incredibly easy-to-use and affordable to all.
related_products.features:
TicketSource is a free, professional-level online ticket sales system that's incredibly easy-to-use and affordable to all. Promote, sell and manage any event in any venue.

We've been in your shoes, experienced the same ticketing challenges and scaled the same ticketing peaks, so we've designed our ticketing system to be simple, cost-and-drama-free, basically, we get it.

related_products.short_desc: To create the most compelling event platform which powers organizations looking to scale using modern technology tools.
related_products.features: Showpass is a global leader in event technology, primary ticketing and distribution, and the mixed delivery (live, virtual and streamed) of experiences for tens of thousands of event hosts. Showpass provides access to global distribution and discovery channels including Facebook's native ticketing, Google Reserve, and a proprietary publishers network. Showpass creates solutions for complex events, large organizations, and high-volume event producers and is proud to serve millions of customers.

related_products.short_desc: RSVPify is a leading online ticketing platform that helps streamline events from guest registration through check-in.
related_products.features: A leading online ticketing and event management platform trusted by 30% of the Fortune 500. Manage events big and small with ease and keep the spotlight on your brand. Powerful features including email invitations, online registration and RSVP, custom data collection, guest list management, menu preferences, sub-event management, event privacy/exclusivity, drag-and-drop seating charts, check-in, and much more.

similar_products.short_desc: Cloud-based platform that helps manage client memberships, ticketing, visitor admission, and fundraising campaigns.
similar_products.features: Blackbaud Altru is a cloud-based all-in-one cultural organization management solution that includes tools to manage ticketing for events and programs, cultivate a membership and donor database, run a point of sale system in person and online, and more. Designed specifically for art and historical museums, zoos, aquariums, gardens, and science centers, Blackbaud Altru provides a 360-degree view of your visitors, members, and donors.

similar_products.short_desc: Your Affordable, All-in-One Event Platform. Instant payouts, 24/7 live support. For only $1 per ticket plus 1% of the ticket sale.
similar_products.features: Whether you're hosting a conference, festival, sporting event, concert, or gala, Accelevents has the perfect solution for your event needs. Our all-in-one event platform offers instant payouts, 24/7 live support (for free), conference agenda management, assigned seating, and a host of fundraising tools. All for just $1 per ticket plus 1% of the ticket price (all fees can be absorbed by your ticket buyers).

similar_products.short_desc: Successful events start with Tix. Email marketing, social distancing, donations and more. Low cost and risk free. Get started today!
similar_products.features:
Successful events start with Tix.  Feature-rich ticketing including integrated e-mail marketing tools, social distancing seat maps, timed admissions, donations, up-selling, season ticket renewals, custom branding, web site integration and more.  All risk free with no term commitment and low fees.
Contact us for a Free Demo today!

similar_products.short_desc: Ticketsauce is a white label event ticketing & marketing solution that fits every use case and is customizable to fit your every need.
similar_products.features:
Ticketing platforms are either antiquated, expensive, lack customer support, or all of the above.

Ticketsauce and NIGHTOUT came together because we see the whitespace that no other company is addressing; A fully integrated event ticketing and marketing solution that is fundamentally based on the success of our clients.

We've created a one-of-a-kind platform to shake up the event industry and deliver on customer needs.

similar_products.short_desc: Powerful online ticketing and booking solutions for tour, activity, attraction, and event businesses of all sizes.
similar_products.features: FareHarbor provides industry-leading online ticketing and booking solutions for tours, activities, attractions, and events. Through one intuitive Dashboard, FareHarbor eases operations for 16,000+ businesses worldwide. Options like custom seat maps, online seat selection, and automatic assignments can all be tailored to your unique needs while capacity limits and contactless ticket scanning help you maintain the latest safety protocols. All of this alongside our best-in-class, 24/7 support.

similar_products.short_desc: Launch your event in minutes! We are an all-in-one ticketing solution that provides you and your attendees a unified experience!
similar_products.features: Launch your event in minutes! We are an all-in-one ticketing solution that provides you and your attendees a unified experience! We offer seamless ticketing that is custom with emails, reports, analytics, event pages, and more. Also an Online Experience with chat, one-on-one chat, host moderation, notes, and everything you need to engage your attendees. Join the 30,000+ events that use Brushfire every year! Plus a team you can actually talk to! (866) 825-8252

similar_products.short_desc: Clubspeed's innovative online booking offers a quick, easy way for your customers to reserve activities or events from any device.
similar_products.features: Clubspeed's innovative online booking ticketing system offers a quick, easy way for your customers to reserve activities or events from any mobile device. Our system is a simple, yet extremely powerful and easy-to-use system for every member of your team. Clubspeed uses Smart Learning AI to schedule and reduce overhead while increasing the overall power of your system. Regardless of your specific needs, the world's most trusted family entertainment platform is here to help you succeed!

similar_products.short_desc: The leading ticketing & guest experience solution, backed by 33 years of servicing the world's top attractions.
similar_products.features: For 33 years, Gateway's flagship Galaxy Ticketing & Guest Experience software has been the leading global solution for visitor attractions that need the tools to manage every facet of their operations, including: ticketing online, onsite and at kiosks, timed and capacity managed ticketing, admission control, group sales, retail, food and beverage, membership/pass/donor management, plus reporting and CRM.

similar_products.short_desc: KORONA ticketing POS has no contracts or hidden fees. All training and support is included with a subscription. Try it for free.
similar_products.features:
KORONA ticketing POS system is a complete solution for water parks, amusement parks, museums, concerts, and festivals. KORONA's software is built for all verticals and keeps sales consolidated among ticket booths, eCommerce, kiosks, QSRs, and gift shops.

KORONA ticketing integrates with powerful scanners, ticket printers, self-checkout kiosks, and robust turnstiles keeping lines moving quickly. It also comes with CRM, memberships, loyalty, and group rate options.

similar_products.short_desc: Sell tickets online and host your most successful event ever with TicketSpice.
similar_products.features:
Host your most successful event ever with TicketSpice. 

TicketSpice is an easy-to-use, highly customizable, and unbelievably affordable ticketing platform. At just $0.99 per ticket, you'll save thousands, while offering a seamlessly simple ticketing experience. 

TicketSpice is flexible and feature-rich, offering full branding control, timed ticketing, reserved seating, mobile scanning, box office, merchandise options, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: Manage your event's ticketing with Zoho Backstage-no commission ticket sales, flexible payment methods, and instant payouts guaranteed.
similar_products.features: With Zoho Backstage, you take complete control of your event's ticketing and get to keep all the profits. Plus, flexible payment options (cash, cheque, or digital payments), a 0% commission rate, and more than 10 payment gateways. We also help you in all aspects of your event ticketing-from charging tax and addressing refunds to setting up promo codes and managing guest lists.

similar_products.short_desc: Xola builds modern, easy-to-use, booking & marketing software for tour and activity businesses that will save you time & help you grow.
similar_products.features: Xola is the only unified booking, sales, and marketing platform for tour and activity businesses. Manage bookings anywhere with real-time availability. Sell through the world's largest marketplaces in a few clicks. Increase online revenue with our powerful abandoned booking remarketing features and track your marketing success in Google Analytics. CC rates as low as 1.99% + 30 cents.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Android Kiosk software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. related_categories.description: Android Kiosk software enables Android devices to be used as public access terminals for browsing, feedback submission, online ordering, and more.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Event Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Event Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Event Management software automates marketing, registration, coordination and scheduling of events. Planners use Event Management applications to manage the planning and process of meetings and events, including marketing, attendee registration, badge creation, calendar generation and venue space management. These applications also offer a variety of self-service functions for event attendees such as online registration, content delivery and fee payment. Event Management software is related to Registration software and Ticketing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top iPad Kiosk software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. related_categories.description: iPad Kiosk software enables iPads to be used as public access terminals for browsing, feedback submission, online ordering, and more.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Registration software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Registration tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Registration software automates the process of registering for conferences, meetings, classes, and other events. These applications offer a customizable solution for attendance tracking and event or meeting registration tasks. They also provide tools for processing payments either in advance or onsite, as well as donation collection and volunteer coordination features. Registration solutions also offer a variety of self-service functions for event attendees such as online registration, content delivery, and fee payment. Registration software is related to Event Management software and Training software.

related_categories.description: Venue Management solutions aim to help event planners with marketing and scheduling of their facilities, ensuring that appropriate services and resources are provided for each event, and that the facility's capacity is optimally utilized.
